item.title: Install Jenkins Plugin via Ansible
item.description: 1example@user:/opt/ansible-playbooks$ cat vars/jenkins.yml 2## Search names from https://plugins.jenkins.io/ 3jenkins_plugins: 4- git 5- hipchat 6- log-parser 7- mask-passwords 8- ssh-agent 9- ssh

item.title: Plugin install without FTP Credentials
item.description: Normal behavior of Wordpress when installing plugin is to ask for FTP credentials. So to fix the problem, just add this line to wp-config.php (of course, make sure permission are fine). 1define('FS_METHOD','direct'); More troubleshooting details in https://www.digitalocean.com/community/questions/wordpress-asking-for-ftp-credentials
